bioconda.name: conus
bioconda.summary: CONUS is an implementation of simple stochastic context-free grammars for RNA secondary structure analysis.CONUS developed for exploring the consequences of different single sequence SCFG designs in predicting RNA secondary structure.

biocontainers.summary: CONUS is an implementation of simple stochastic context-free grammars for RNA secondary structure analysis.CONUS developed for exploring the consequences of different single sequence SCFG designs in predicting RNA secondary structure.
